title: Chariton Township, Randolph County, Missouri
text:
Chariton Township is an inactive <a href="civil%20township">township</a> in <a href="Randolph%20County%2C%20Missouri">Randolph County</a>, in the <a href="U.S.%20state">U.S. state</a> of <a href="Missouri">Missouri</a>.
Chariton Township was erected in 1832.
